Name: Keyboard Warrior
About the game: 'Type Fast to Survive!' You are protecting your city from AI drones by controlling a turret. You are behind a screen of Camera showing the turret and incoming enemies. The enemies showing with a tag displaying theri ID's, which are different words. To make the turret targeting and firing to enemies, you have to type the ID of the drone correctly. And you should type fast to gain more points. This Game will improve your typing skills, you can see your typing speed in the game as 'letter per second, and word per minute'
